Text:
This a real link, bit skeptical of .zip's but would love to see what is in this gift paqckage described by poster. 

-"The pdf files are of varying quality as most of them are extracted from web sites (though many of them no longer available)."

I hate to disagree here, but I got a new copy of Pinball, 1973 a couple of months ago.  Any decent Japanese movie and literature company can get you a copy direct from Japan, but granted, they're a bugger to find.  It's just not very in-print in the west.  The rest of the short stories though, thanks! =)
